Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Complete WriterAI implementation - fully functional novel generation system

- Run scaffold generator to create core prometheus_novel structure
- Add FastAPI web dashboard with WebSocket support for real-time updates
- Implement CLI interface with interactive mode and file-based input
- Create 12-stage pipeline orchestrator with state management
- Implement LLM clients \(OpenAI, Gemini, Anthropic\) with streaming support
- Fix browser plugin port mismatch \(now uses ws://localhost:8080/ws\)
- Update start scripts for Windows and Unix with proper error handling
- Add testing infrastructure with pytest fixtures and unit/integration tests
- Create .env.example template for environment configuration

The system now provides:
- Web dashboard at http://localhost:8080
- CLI commands: new, generate, compile, ideas, serve
- 12-stage novel generation pipeline
- Multi-provider LLM support with fallbacks
- Browser extension for capturing ideas

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add flexible seed command for story idea input

- Add new ''seed'' command with three input modes:
  - FULL: See complete template, paste everything at once
  - GUIDED: Step-by-step prompts, skip any with Enter
  - MINIMAL: Just give idea, AI expands the rest
- Show complete template upfront so users know all options
- Support file-based input for pre-generated templates
- AI expansion fills in missing sections automatically
- Creates project with full config from seed data

Usage: python -m interfaces.cli.main seed

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
